title: A Tale of Six Trillion Years and a Night - Novel Updates
tags: Child Abuse   Confinement   Male Protagonist   Wishes
author: Kemu Voxx   Nishimoto Hirona   西本紘奈
description: The child of abomination, Riku, meets a lonely girl, Ai, who teaches him about warmth. But when he is miserably robbed of that warmth, an unknown god named Maki-chan reveals herself and tells him that she can grant him whatever he wishes for?! This is the biggest taboo of unraveling the past KEMU VOXX related songs!>
